matador_BusinessLogic

Class Spiller

  • java.lang.Object
    • matador_BusinessLogic.Spiller

  • public class Spiller
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides a Spiller that is used in a dice game. The Spiller hold a name, points, spillerint and tolvlasttime. Provides necessary functions used by the Spil class.
    Author:
    Martin Caspersen
    See Also:
    Spil
